statements: SELECT * FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, currency_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, currency_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE currency_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 12345 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, currency_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE currency_amount > 100 ORDER BY currency_amount ASC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(currency_amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING transaction_count > 3;
SELECT AVG(currency_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(currency_amount) AS max_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE currency_id = 1;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM Currency WHERE currency_value > 100;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM Currency WHERE currency_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Currency ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM Currency WHERE currency_id = 1;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM Currency WHERE currency_value > 100 ORDER BY currency_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, currency_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, currency_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, currency_amount FROM currency_balance WHERE currency_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_type, currency_amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM game_users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM game_users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(currency_amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM game_users JOIN currency_balance USING(user_id) WHERE currency_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM game_users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, MAX(currency_amount) AS max_amount FROM currency_balance;
SELECT * FROM Currency;
SELECT currency_name, currency_value FROM Currency ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Players WHERE player_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM Players JOIN Inventory ON Players.player_id = Inventory.player_id ORDER BY player_name, item_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Currency WHERE currency_value > 1000;
SELECT player_name, player_balance FROM Players ORDER BY player_balance DESC;
SELECT player_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Players INNER JOIN Transactions ON Players.player_id = Transactions.player_id;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_quantity < 10 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT currency_name, MAX(currency_value) AS highest_currency_value FROM Currency;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, currency_balance FROM player ORDER BY currency_balance DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM item WHERE item_price < 100;

SELECT player.player_name, item.item_name, transaction.transaction_amount FROM player INNER JOIN transaction ON player.player_id = transaction.player_id INNER JOIN item ON transaction.item_id = item.item_id;
SELECT admin_name, admin_role FROM admin WHERE admin_role = 'Super Admin';
SELECT player_name, currency_balance FROM player;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM item WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT player.player_name, item.item_name, transaction.transaction_amount FROM player, item, transaction WHERE player.player_id = transaction.player_id AND item.item_id = transaction.item_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT admin_name, admin_role FROM admin WHERE admin_role = 'Superuser';
